This breaks the natural dialogue flow and is not contextually appropriate for a podcast transcript. Furthermore, the inconsistent translation of the podcast title ('Tech Éclair' at the start, 'Tech Rápido' at the end) indicates a lack of complete contextual adaptation. evaluation.overall_comment: The translation provides a basic understanding of the source text, but it is riddled with notable errors that diminish its overall quality.
